name: Those Nights at Ring's
description:
Local fast-food restaurant looking for a late-night technician. Look over animatronic characters and monitor building for errors. You will take full responsibility for anything suspicious.

Those Nights at Ring's is a FNAF Fan Game with characters based on Sonic OCs. You take the role of technician, Mitzi Clement, as you monitor the building, and make sure the animatronics are safe, along with repairing anything that may go offline during the night. Ring's Food Palace is not responsible for any of the dangers you may face.
